quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: If it is not right, do not do it. If it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: No man is free who is not master of himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The obstacle is the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's mind there are few.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: Perhaps the biggest tragedy of our lives is that freedom is possible, yet we can pass our years trapped in the same old patterns.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: The boundary to what we can accept is the boundary to our freedom.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: When we resist what is, we miss the opportunity to engage fully with our life.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: Mindfulness is not about getting anywhere else. It is about being where you are and knowing it.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: Your ability to generate power is directly proportional to your ability to relax.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: You can do anything, but not everything.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Much of the stress that people feel doesn't come from having too much to do. It comes from not finishing what they started.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: If you can't get motivated, getting organized is the next best thing.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: You are a badass. You were one when you came screaming onto this planet and you are one now.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: If you're serious about changing your life, you'll find a way. If you're not, you'll find an excuse.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: What you tell yourself on a daily basis is more powerful than you know.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: You need to go from wanting to change your life to deciding to change your life.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: What other people think about you has nothing to do with you and everything to do with them.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: We're all going to die, all of us. What a circus! That alone should make us love each other, but it doesn't.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: You and everyone you know are going to be dead soon. And in the short amount of time between here and there, you have a limited amount of f*cks to give.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Who you are is defined by what you're willing to struggle for.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Not giving a f*ck does not mean being indifferent; it means being comfortable with being different.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: The desire for more positive experience is itself a negative experience. And, paradoxically, the acceptance of one's negative experience is itself a positive experience.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Nice Guys believe that if they are good, giving, and caring, they will in return be happy, loved, and fulfilled.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Trying to be what one is not wastes the person one is.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Putting yourself first is essential. When recovering Nice Guys start putting themselves first, they are often amazed at how quickly and easily they move toward their personal goals.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Setting boundaries is not a selfish act but a healthy one.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: If you want to be liked, don't try so hard to be liked.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Compassion is not a relationship between the healer and the wounded. It's a relationship between equals.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: Radical Acceptance is the willingness to experience ourselves and our lives as it is.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: The intimacy that arises in listening and speaking truth is only possible if we can open to the vulnerability of our own hearts.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: The way you think about your work determines how you do it.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: In order to see things more objectively, you must make sure you're in a position to do so.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Things rarely get stuck because of lack of time. They get stuck because the doing of them has not been defined.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Our stuckness comes from clinging to the view that we are our worthlessness.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you implement that effort into your life every single day, that's where transformation happens.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Healthy love is based on two people acknowledging and addressing their own problems with each other's support.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: When we give ourselves permission to fail, we at the same time give ourselves permission to excel.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: A lack of clear next actions is often the reason people procrastinate.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Sometimes surrender means giving up trying to understand and becoming comfortable with not knowing.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: You can't change your entire life in one day, but you can change your direction.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: Action isn't just the effect of motivation; it's also the cause of it.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Nice Guys are dishonest. They don't express their feelings and they don't ask for what they want.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: There is something wonderfully bold and liberating about saying yes to our entire imperfect and messy life.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: The best system is not the most complex one. The best system is the one you'll actually use.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Self-worth comes from one thing: thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: The universe doesn't reward people who try hard. It rewards people who are committed.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: Being integrated means being one's authentic self.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: When we learn to respond to our difficult experiences with compassion, we are learning to be at home with the truth of who we are.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: You can't selectively numb your anger, any more than you can turn off all lights in a room and still expect to see the one you left on.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Weekly reviews are a must for anyone who is serious about getting and staying organized.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Love yourself so much that when someone treats you wrong, you recognize it.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: The more you try to be certain about yourself, the more uncertain you become.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Meeting a woman's needs is not what turns her on. What turns her on is the demonstration of passion and confidence.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Meditation is not about stopping thoughts but recognizing that we are more than our thoughts and our feelings.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage—pleasantly, smilingly, unapologetically—to say no to other things.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: We cannot selectively numb emotions. When we numb the painful emotions, we also numb the positive emotions.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: Nice Guys try to hide their perceived flaws and mistakes. They try to be who they think others want them to be.
quotes.author: Robert Glover

quotes.text: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.text: Focusing on the outcome won't get you to the outcome. The process will.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.text: Stop waiting for someone else to fix you. You are the one you've been waiting for.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.text: Maturity is learning to choose love over hate, choose yourself over anything else, and choose to forgive over holding grudges.
quotes.author: Mark Manson
quotes.source: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

quotes.text: When we meet others with an openhearted presence, we become a sanctuary for their pain.
quotes.author: Tara Brach
